resources.string: Every party needs a name.\nYour friends need to know which party to join and I need a name to store party data you can later retrieve.
Tell your friends to join your party from the main menu. Their devices appear below.
Something prevented creation of the "listen" socket. This is required to let other devices talk to me. Without it, I cannot even start creating the party.
I cannot create the "heroes gather here" service. There\'s nothing I can do about it.\n(Error %1$s)
Looks like the Network Service Discovery is unavailable. I require this thing to let your friends join the party.
The party will be visible to all devices on the same network.
Say something so the party owner can recognize you
